Thanks David.

I didn't found the patch yet but I solved it that way:

I co=
pied the sourcecode of Parameterized.java and changed only this 
line of co=
de:


return String.format("[%s]", fParameterSetNumber);

into this one

re=
turn String.format("[%s] - %s", fParameterSetNumber, fParameters
[fParamete=
rs.length - 1].toString());

And I used my new Runner instead of Parameteri=
zed.class
That means the last Parameter on each TestCase is the name.
